title: Jobs Report and Reasons Why People Shouldn’t Hoard
itunes:title: Jobs Report and Reasons Why People Shouldn’t Hoard
description:
Former U.S. Deputy Secretary of Labor Chris Lu discusses the March jobs report and the Trump administration's handling of the coronavirus outbreak. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek Economics Editor Peter Coy talk about why there’s no good reason to hoard items, especially food. Greg Farrell, Bloomberg News Investigative Reporter, walks through Georgia Senator Loeffler selling travel shares ahead of President Trump’s flight ban.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
